item.description:
My dog, Buffett, and I will be taking advantage of what is predicted to be a good day by taking a longer than usual hike over mostly flat trails and forest roads.  Inclement weather cancels.

Wear layers appropriate to the weather and bring water and snacks for yourself and your dog (s) if your bringing any along.  Most hiking will be on trails or dirt roads but bring a leash for road crossings or short distances near traffic.

It's always good to check the hike status before heading to the forest in case of last minute cancellations or changes.  If you find you cannot attend, please try to change your RSVP an hour prior to hike time so we do not wait for you.  Thanks.

This hike will allow for those choosing to hike 2 hours or under to return to headquarters via the bike trail while others hike for a longer time.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: January First Sunday Hike
